Summary: A large hovering craft with many lights and odd mechanical whooshing sound
divs: Sighting Details1.Witnesses: Debbie, Brienn and Chanel Fusco ages 53-30 and 26 respectively were standing outside smoking cigarettes at the rear of my mother in laws home in Seaville,NJ at around 11 PM on Monday December 3rd, 2007. A very large low flying craft (perhaps 80 feet long) containing many different colored lights and producing a very odd mechanical whooshing sound suddenly appeared from the left side of their field of vision and slowly hovered around the perimeter of the house in a straight line. They "all" felt as if they were being observed. They all felt a sensation of fear when they realized the object was not an airplane. They had no desire to observe where the object was heading after it left their field of vision. (They were all scared) They reported no wings on the low flying craft that was below the tree line at the rear of the home. They never heard or saw anything like it before.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Upper
